General.Name: GMR Airports Infrastructure Limited
General.Description: GMR Airports Infrastructure Limited operates and develops airports in India. It is also involved in operation of international airports on build, own, operate, and transfer basis. The company was formerly known as GMR Infrastructure Limited and changed its name to GMR Airports Infrastructure Limited in September 2022. GMR Airports Infrastructure Limited was incorporated in 1996 and is based in New Delhi, India.
General.Address: New Udaan Bhawan, New Delhi, India, 110 037
